title: Double-clicking on import statement transfers to referenced type
OB: When using Build 20020528, in the package view outline, double-clicking on a type import statement does not open the editor on the unit hosting the import reference. Instead, it opens the editor on the target type.
EB: When using Build 20020528, in the package view outline, double-clicking on a type import statement should open the editor on the unit hosting the import reference, not on the target type.
SR:
1. Launch the software using Build 20020528.
2. Navigate to the package view outline.
3. Double-click on a type import statement.
4. Observe that the editor opens on the target type instead of the unit hosting the import reference.
